summary.para: Pointer to the data. When provides the pointer, the runtime ensures that the pointer has a specific alignment, depending on the following feature levels:

item.description: For and higher, the pointer is aligned to 16 bytes.
For lower than , the pointer is aligned to 4 bytes.
